long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Jotspot is a simple note taking chrome extension accessible from anywhere on the web. Not too groundbreaking, but sometimes you want something simple that just works. Notes are saved on your computer for offline access and security.

Coming soon:
- Better UI that uses more of the available space
- Download and upload notes as .jotspot files for easy sharing (compatible with web version)
